titleStmt.title: William H. Sidell to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1536

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
HEAD-QUARTERS ACT'G ASST. PROVOST MARSHAL GENERAL,
STATE OF KENTUCKY,
Louisville, Ky December 23 1863
Hon Thos E, Bramlette
Governor of Ky. Frankfort
Governor

I have the honor herewith to transmit copy of a communication this day received from the War Department in answer to a letter from these Head Quarters based upon your communication of the 8" inst relative to a conscription order issued by Genl Hurlbut.

I am Governor
Very Respectfully
Your Obt Svt
W. H Sidell Maj 15 infy and ass PMG. for Ky
per Geo M Lane
Capt I C & Adj
